resources.string: Parents are requested to clear the August month fee on or before 10th august.If you already cleared the payment then ignore this message

Everybody is full busy in watching status and uploading.Some status by other will tells the perfect situation about you.So like it and save that status for your purpose.So many find many third party applications for the whats app status downloader.I hope you have that application.If you have that application open it and follow my steps. 
 1.Go to settings 
 2.Open "List" menu 
 3.Check the box "Show Hidden file and Folders 
That's it done.
Thank you for your support.
